name: 永夜之冬
description:
Background of the game
Once upon a time there was a forest called the Druid forest. There are a group of witches who are good at using all kinds of magic. They live happily in this forest, accompanied by the beautiful nature of the forest. But one day, in the name of saving the forest, the dark creatures devoured everything in the forest. Darkness fills the whole sky! The original beautiful forest only left the dark sky, no snow and the snowflakes falling alone. Witches use magic to hide themselves from dark creatures. Just when their magic power was almost exhausted, the player passed through the world by accident and came to the witch. After the communication with the witch, understand the situation here, so the player decided to help the witch defeat the dark creature.
Game routes
In the game, we need to collect pseudo light source to lead out all kinds of dark creatures hiding in the dark. When you defeat a dark creature, you can take back the things it devours. At this time, you can put these things back in the forest to get the real light source, or you can exchange them for various props to defeat the dark creatures more smoothly. Finally to rebuild a forest! When the collected light source reaches a certain level, the strongest among the dark creatures, the fire dragon, will be defeated to disperse the darkness of this forest. Let the forest shine again. Finally unlock the secret of eternal night! Is it really the darkness that keeps this forest at night?
Game features
The attack in the game is long-range attack and close combat attack. There are up to 16 kinds of melee weapons. They are scattered in a certain position in the forest, so you need to take the initiative to find them. At most, 3 close combat weapons can be selected, and then 6 kinds of long-range bows and arrows can be used. Finally, free switching is carried out to realize a variety of attack routines. The effects of each weapon are different, such as: the program sword, when attacking the enemy, there is a certain probability of various bugs, so as to obtain various effects; the hero's sword, the probability of killing the enemy in seconds; the legendary sword: every time it is waved, its attribute can be enhanced; the arrow of ice, the arrow of life
Players jump as long as there is a point of focus can jump infinitely! The higher you jump, you can see different scenery!
As many as 153 kinds of objects can be placed at any place in the forest and placed in all things in the forest. Can change its position, angle. Put it wherever you want. Can freely build their own favorite game scene.
If you are a construction party, change the game painting style is essential!
N kinds of game painting style with your heart! In the game, you can adjust the R, G, B, 3 primary colors to any color according to your own preference, so as to find your favorite painting style.
Strategy (b)
If you want to pass the game, you can't rely on brute force alone! We also need to put 153 kinds of objects in a reasonable position to make these objects work. Finally defeat the powerful dark creatures. Each dark creature in it has its own unique attributes. There are Amethyst scorpions who are good at using crystal energy, fast knights with four blades, dragons who can spray fire, Amethyst puppets who can use dark magic... And dark creatures will cooperate with each other. However, the player is not alone. There are witches who are good at using all kinds of magic to help players defeat dark creatures!
You're worried it won't work? Different difficulty modes are set in the game to meet various needs of players. Simple one hand can clear the customs, and the difficult ones need to play the battle strategy to the extreme!
